mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, THISORDER, RECORDNAME, ARCHIVETYPEID,ARCHIVECODE,RECORDSTYLE,RECORDSCODE
mapper.insert:
select seq_FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS_id.nextval from dual
insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, ARCHIVECODE, JQBH, ARCHIVETYPEID, ARCHIVESEQID, RECORDSCODE,
AJBH,
THISORDER,
RECORDNAME,
RECORDSTYLE,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{archivecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{thisorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{recordname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recordstyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THISORDER = #{thisorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDNAME = #{recordname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS where SCBJ=0
AND ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
ORDER BY THISORDER ASC
